goal: 创建一个简单的Python Hello World程序,打印hello world 789 ， 文件保存在hello_world.py

rules.name: Create Python Script
rules.condition: Start creating a simple Python Hello World program
rules.action: Write a Python script that prints 'hello world 789' and save it as hello_world.py
rules.expected_outcome: A Python script named hello_world.py is created with the correct output

rules.name: Test Python Script
rules.action: Execute the Python script to verify it prints 'hello world 789'
rules.expected_outcome: The script executes successfully and prints 'hello world 789'
